tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE golf_lessons (
    lesson_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    lesson_date DATE,
    lesson_time TIME,
    instructor_id INT,
    student_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE golf_lessons (
    lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lesson_date DATE,
    lesson_time TIME,
    instructor_id INT,
    student_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE golf_lessons (
    lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lesson_date DATE,
    lesson_time TIME,
    instructor_id INT,
    student_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE GolfLessons (
    lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lesson_date DATE,
    lesson_time TIME,
    instructor_id INT,
    student_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE golf_lessons_schedule (
  lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lesson_date DATE,
  lesson_time TIME,
  instructor_id INT,
  student_id INT
);
